txt.en: Akhrûn is in Naerband.\n\nYou should find and speak with Akhrûn quickly.
Now you should be able to find out what is in the guard's register
<rgb=#FF0000>Listen</rgb> more closely to the noise
Naerband is located in Talath Úrui.\n\nYou should enter Naerband.
The register contains text about the coming and goings of prisoners, jailers, and torturers
With Akhrûn returning to Nurn, you decide to infiltrate Naerband to learn more of the terrible Thraknûl.
Retrieve and read the guard's register
Enter Naerband
You find some sort of register inside a locked guard room
You hear a noise echoing through the prison halls
It looks as if the former guard had been recently tortured
It sounds like Akhrûn has been recaptured!
Naerband is located in Talath Úrui.\n\nNow with the knowledge you have acquired through the guard's register, you should complete additional tasks within Naerband.
The register contains text about the coming and goings of prisoners, jailers, and torturers
The smell of burnt flesh permeates the air around you
Naerband is located in Talath Úrui.\n\nYou should retrieve the key from the corpse of the guard.
Naerband is located in Talath Úrui.\n\nYou should search Naerband for information about Thraknûl.
The guard abandoned the post.\n\nYou should search Naerband's dungeons for the guard.
Naerband is located in Talath Úrui.\n\nYou should retrieve and read the guard's register.
Find Akhrûn
Naerband is located in Talath Úrui.\n\nYou should find the lever that opens the torture chamber.
Naerband is located in Talath Úrui.\n\nYou should listen.
Retrieve the guard's key
Search Naerband for information about Thraknûl
The smell of burnt flesh permeates the air around you
'Quickly, help me [placeholder]! We were ambushed at the mountain's base on our way to Nurn!'
Search Naerband for the guard
Retrieve and read the guard's register
Find the lever that opens the torture chamber

'Before we part ways, there is something that I think you should know about Naerband.

'When flames poured from the mountain and created the lake of fire, the heat reached all the way underneath the prison fortress and burned alive those within. I overheard the story from Orcs while I was imprisoned.

'The prison is still run by a Black Uruk known far and wide as Thraknûl. He was known as the Dark Lord's chief torturer. It seems Thraknûl is still running Naerband as a prison even after the tower fell. Does the Uruk serve a new master? I know not.'

You decide it would be worthwhile to investigate further the matter of Thraknûl.

'I wish you luck. Be careful, [placeholder]. If Thraknûl catches you, you may never see the outside of Naerband again!'
Naerband is located in Talath Úrui.\n\nYou should listen more closely.
Enter Naerband
Complete Servants of Urudanî
You hear the door to the torture chamber unlock
Complete The Key to Chaos
Listen
Complete The Madness of Thraknûl
Into Naerband
